snippet: Edward Beers and his father, John, live in a trailer next to their house on Staten Island, which was engulfed by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty, beneficiariy of UJA-Federation of New York, organization supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, used $999.99 from fund to buy two full-size beds for home of Edward Beers and his father John; Beers family lives in trailer next to their house on Staten Island, which was engulfed by Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Edward Beers and his father, John, live in a trailer next to their house on Staten Island, which was engulfed by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.print_headline: In Their Trailer, a Man Cares for His Father
headline.main: In Their Trailer, a Man Takes Care of His Father

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
